mapper.select: select proj_no, proj_name, proj_agency, proj_start, proj_end from( select /*+INDEX_DESC(project pk_project) */ rownum rn, p.proj_no proj_no, p.proj_name proj_name, p.proj_agency proj_agency, to_char(p.proj_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') proj_start, to_char(p.proj_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') proj_end from project p, proj_management m where m.dept_no = #{dept_no} and p.proj_no = m.proj_no) where rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount} order by proj_no desc
select proj_name, proj_agency, proj_start, proj_end from project where proj_no = #{proj_no}
SELECT dept_no FROM employee Where emp_no = #{emp_no}
SELECT count(proj_no) FROM project p, proj_management m WHERE p.proj_no = m.proj_no
mapper.insert: insert into project (proj_no, proj_name, proj_agency, proj_start, proj_end) values (project_seq.nextval, #{proj_name}, #{proj_agency}, #{proj_start}, #{proj_end})
insert into proj_management(proj_no, dept_no) values ((select MAX(proj_no) from project ),#{dept_no})
mapper.update: update project set proj_name = #{proj_name}, proj_agency = #{proj_agency}, proj_start = to_char(#{proj_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , proj_end = to_char(#{proj_end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where proj_no = #{proj_no}
